Joe King (born ) is an American former college football coach. He was the head football coach for St. Peter's High School from 1972 to 1973, Watervliet High School from 1974 to 1980, and for Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) from 1989 to 2010. He played college football for Siena.
King retired as RPI's all-time leader in wins.
